RSSChannelDef.Title: Deep Thoughts
RSSChannelDef.divider:
For Source Title and Description fields, use this syntax:
     To map to meta-value use: meta.metaname
        where metaname is one of the following: UserCreated, UserLastModified,
         DateContent, DateCreated, DateExpired, DateLastModified, DateReleased
     To map to a property value use: property.propertyname+
           where propertyname is any valid property
              (adding the optional plus sign at the end will search the parent)
     To map to content field use: field.fieldname[size+-]
        where fieldname is the name of the content field
           (adding the optional size will truncate the size in the feed listing)
        use + to truncate up to the next period or end
        or use - to truncate down
